ðŸ“– Summary: LoFi Engine is a tool for generating LoFi music on desktop platforms. It allows users to create custom atmospheres by combining different sound elements and customizing the look and feel of the application. The engine utilizes Tone.js for procedural track generation and offers offline functionality for a private and accessible music creation experience.
